shortdesc.ph: The push position of the external audio frame. Set in or .

plentry.pd: 0: The position before local playback. If you need to play the external audio frame on the local client, set this position.
1: The position after audio capture and before quaio pre-processing. If you need the audio module of the SDK to process the external audio frame, set this position.
2: The position after audio pre-processing and bedfore audio encoding. If you do not need the audio module of the SDK to process the external audio frame, set this position.
